mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param_type ty ON ts.param_type = ty.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user tu ON ts.create_by = tu.id
mapper.select:
SELECT ts.id AS 'id', ts.param_key AS 'paramKey', ts.param_value AS 'paramValue', ts.param_explain AS 'paramExplain', ts.param_uplimit AS 'paramUplimit', ty.type_name AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.typeName', tu.id AS 'createBy.id', tu.name AS 'createBy.name', ts.sort, ts.create_date AS 'createDate', ts.remarks FROM mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param ts
WHERE 1 = 1
AND ts.param_key LIKE '%'||#{paramKey}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{paramKey}, '%')
AND ts.param_type = #{paramType}
AND ts.del_flag = 0 AND ts.param_type != (SELECT id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param_type WHERE alia_name = 'sale_') ORDER BY ts.sort DESC

SELECT ts.id AS 'id', ts.param_key AS 'paramKey', ts.param_value AS 'paramValue', ts.param_explain AS 'paramExplain', ts.param_uplimit AS 'paramUplimit', ty.id AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.id', ty.type_name AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.typeName', ty.alia_name AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.aliaName', tu.id AS 'createBy.id', tu.name AS 'createBy.name', ts.sort, ts.create_date AS 'createDate', ts.remarks FROM mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param ts
WHERE ts.id = #{id} AND ts.del_flag = 0

SELECT ts.id AS 'id', ts.param_key AS 'paramKey', ts.param_value AS 'paramValue', ts.param_explain AS 'paramExplain', ts.param_uplimit AS 'paramUplimit', ty.id AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.id', ty.type_name AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.typeName', ty.alia_name AS 'mtmyRuleParamType.aliaName', tu.id AS 'createBy.id', tu.name AS 'createBy.name', ts.sort, ts.create_date AS 'createDate', ts.remarks FROM mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param ts
WHERE ts.param_key = #{key} AND ts.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param ( param_key, param_value, param_type, param_explain, param_uplimit, create_by, create_date, sort, remarks) VALUES ( #{paramKey}, #{paramValue}, #{mtmyRuleParamType.id}, #{paramExplain}, #{paramUplimit}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{sort}, #{remarks})
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param SET param_key = #{paramKey}, param_value = #{paramValue}, param_type = #{mtmyRuleParamType.id}, param_explain = #{paramExplain}, param_uplimit = #{paramUplimit}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, del_flag = 1 WHERE param_type = #{paramType}

AND type_name LIKE '%'||#{typeName}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{typeName}, '%')
AND del_flag = 0 AND alia_name != 'sale_' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id,type_name AS 'typeName',alia_name AS 'aliaName',remarks FROM mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param_type WHERE del_flag = 0 AND id = #{id} ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param_type ( type_name, alia_name, remarks) VALUES ( #{typeName}, #{aliaName}, #{remarks})
